title: Bright Grotesk
content:
This is going to drop soon. Just selecting which channel to use. It's been on hold for quite some time until one of my recent project calls for it. It's my first typeface that's not for free so wish me luck on sale :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317084304im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BG-Type-Specimen---Final_5840.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [BG Type Specimen - Final.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317084304/http:/typophile.com/files/BG%20Type%20Specimen%20-%20Final.pdf) | 137.3 KB |
author: alienbreed

comments.content: Nice and I love the ampersand = good luck.
The italic swash caps are a nice touch!

A beautiful sans. Hope it sells good!  
P.S. Love the name!
